Anomaly Detection Project: Completion!

Mar 10, 2022 • Tony Wang

Recently, I had the pleasure of being part of the team that submitted our results and working prototypes for the “AI for Decision-Making” (Stage 1 Phase 2) project proposed by the Defence Innovation Network, a University-Defence lead iniative to provide funding for projects with relevance to Australian Defence.

You can find our work, with demonstrations, in our repository. We also wrote up a series of blog posts, aimed at introducing people to our work without getting overly technical. You can find this hosted here.

In the future, I will write up my learnings from this project and on anomaly detection as a whole, to both remember and showcase the work we had done and how it might be applied and extended. Stay tuned!
